description: Description: PPriBResultGroup is a column that indicates the MRD flow results of a patient's leukemia treatment, with values of '>=25%', '<25%', '>=0.1% - <5%', '<0.1%', '<0.1%', 'Sample not taken', or 'No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible'.

details.9: No marker found and/or monitoring not feasible
